en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
jw:
Gabung karo atusan peneliti saka sak
           donya sing bagéan saka komunitas Open Specy dening
           nganalisa, nuduhake, ngolah, lan ngenali
           spektrum Raman lan IR. Layanan iki gratis lan open source thanks kanggo mitra:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
jw:
Singkat: Kanggo nggunakake alat, upload file csv, asp, jdx, spc, utawa spa menyang tab file unggahan.
                                  Yen csv, siji kolom kudu dijenengi 'wavenumber' (ing unit 1/cm) lan liyane dijenengi 'intensitas'.
                                  Sampeyan bisa Gamelan data nggunakake Filter SG, baseline mbenerake data nggunakake urutan polinomial saka iModPolyFit, lan matesi sawetara dawa gelombang kanggo cocog.
                                  Asil bakal dibandhingake karo Raman internal utawa perpustakaan spektrum FTIR. 1000 pertandhingan paling kuat bebarengan karo sampeyan
                                  data sing diunggah utawa diproses bakal ditampilake ing plot lan tabel interaktif. Kanggo rincian liyane klik tombol ing ngisor iki
                                  utawa nonton video instruksional sing rinci.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
jw:
Spektrum referensi sumber saka sumber daya akses mbukak
           online, publikasi peer reviewed, lan sumbangan perusahaan. Ing mangsa ngarep
           spektrum sing diunggah menyang alat bakal digabung menyang referensi
           perpustakaan supaya luwih apik.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
jw:
Kanggo nuduhake spektrum, upload file menyang tab upload file. Yen sampeyan milih Nuduhake salinan spektrum sampeyan bakal dikirim menyang Komunitas
           Data Warehouse ing Open Science Framework. Kanggo nambah metadata tambahan,
           isi kolom metadata sing kasedhiya banjur klik -Share Data-. Ing
           file spectra sing sampeyan upload bebarengan karo tanggapan sampeyan bakal disalin
           menyang subfolder -With Metadata- ing pranala ing ngisor iki. Kabeh data sing dienggo bareng terus
           Lisensi Atribusi Creative Commons 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
jw:
Kabeh paramèter ing alat iki dites kanggo validasi
           alat wis fungsi minangka paling apik lan nemtokake standar paling apik
           paramèter kanggo nggunakake. Proses validasi saiki kalebu koreksi
           entri duplikat ing perpustakaan referensi, mriksa spektrum ing
           metadata sing ora ana ing perpustakaan spektral, lan njamin standar
           paramèter nyedhiyani liwat 80% akurasi ing pertandhingan pisanan.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
jw: Nganyari, Panjaluk Fitur, lan Laporan Bug

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
jw: Kita nglacak kabeh nganyari nggunakake kontrol versi ing kode kita. Fitur bisa dijaluk lan bug dilaporake ing GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
jw: Tindakake kita ing Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com kanggo ditambahake menyang mailing list.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
jw: Piranti Lunak FTIR Gratis: piranti lunak identifikasi spektral IR mikroplastik sederhana

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
jw: Akademi Pembelajaran Spektroskopi Gratis saka ThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
jw: Sumber Belajar Mikroskop Optik Gratis saka Florida State University

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
jw: Aplikasi desktop gratis kanggo analisis spektral lan pranala menyang database referensi.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
jw:
Yen sampeyan seneng, kita nuduhake spektrum lan setelan sing diunggah karo komunitas spektroskopi.
           Kanthi gawan, kabeh data bakal dilisensi ing Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Spektrum sing diunggah bakal katon ing kene: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
jw:
Unggah file spektrum Raman utawa FTIR minangka csv, jdx, spc, utawa spa. File csv luwih disenengi. Yen csv, file kasebut kudu ngemot siji kolom kanthi label 'wavenumber' ing unit (1/cm) lan kolom liyane kanthi label 'intensitas' ing unit absorbansi.
            Yen jdx, spc, spa, utawa 0 file kudu spektrum absorbansi siji kanthi nomer gelombang ing (1/cm). File-file kasebut ora mesthi bisa digunakake kanthi sampurna amarga angel diwaca, mula priksa maneh ing piranti lunak liyane.
            Pencet tombol 'Data Tes' kanggo ndownload sampel spektrum Raman.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
jw:
Yen spektrum sing diunggah ora ana ing unit penyerapan,
           nggunakake input iki kanggo nemtokake Unit kanggo ngowahi saka.Open Specy bisa
           nyetel reflektansi utawa transmitansi spektrum kanggo Unit panyerepan nggunakake
           gulung iki ing tab upload file. Kabeh tab sadurunge
           nganggep yen data ana ing unit absorbance supaya sampeyan kudu nggawe
           koreksi sadurunge nerusake yen perlu. Penyesuaian transmisi
           nggunakake log10 (1/T) pitungan sing ora bener kanggo sistem
           lan karakteristik partikel. Imbuhan reflektansi nggunakake
           Persamaan Kubelka-Munk (1-R)2/(2*R). Kita nganggep yen reflektansi
           diformat minangka persen saka 1-100 lan pisanan mbenerake intensitas kanthi dibagi 100
           supaya pas karo wangun samesthine dening pepadhan.
           Yen ora ana sing dipilih, Open Specy nganggep yen data sing diunggah yaiku
           spektrum absorbansi.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
jw: Iki minangka spektrum conto sing bisa diunggah menyang alat kanggo nyoba lan ngerti carane file csv kudu diformat.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
jw:
Kita nuduhake spektrum lan metadata sing diunggah karo komunitas spektroskopi yen sampeyan ngisi metadata ing kene banjur pilih bareng.
           Spektrum lan metadata sing diunggah bakal katon ing kene: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
jw: Gamelan, Baseline Bener, lan Ngundhuh Spectra Diproses

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
jw: Sawetara pangguna bisa uga pengin nyimpen salinan spektrum sing wis diproses. Tombol iki ngundhuh spektrum sing diproses minangka file csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
jw: Gamelan iki bisa nambah rasio sinyal kanggo gangguan saka data lan nggunakake Filter Savitzky-Golay karo 12 titik data mlaku lan polynomial kasebut.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
jw: Rutinitas koreksi garis dasar iki nduweni rong pilihan kanggo koreksi garis dasar, 1) prosedur imodpolyfit polinomial kanggo nggoleki garis dasar spektrum kanthi nggunakke pas polinomial kanggo kabeh wilayah spektrum. 2) garis manual bisa digambar nggunakake alat baris ing plot lan tombol bener bakal nggunakake garis kanggo nyuda garis dasar.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
jw: Watesan jangkoan spektral bisa ngilangi wilayah spektrum sing ora ana puncak lan nambah sing cocog

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
jw: Pilihan iki bakal nemtokake apa perpustakaan cocog FTIR utawa Raman digunakake. Pilih jinis spektrum sing diunggah.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
jw: Pilihan iki bakal nemtokake manawa spektrum sing diunggah (ora diproses) utawa spektrum sing diproses nggunakake tab pangolahan digunakake ing pertandhingan spektrum.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
jw: Pilihan iki bakal nemtokake manawa perpustakaan sing cocog karo sampeyan kalebu spektrum lengkap utawa mung puncak spektrum.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
jw: Tulung kita nggayuh tujuan kanggo ngrevolusi spektroskopi.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
jw: Tim mbayar sing nyurung Open Specy luwih cedhak karo tujuan utama 100% identifikasi spektral sing akurat lan diagnostik spektral jero kanthi siji klik

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
jw: Wong sing dibayar siji-sijine sing kerja kanggo nganyari lan mbangun komunitas lan alat kasebut

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
jw: Biaya pangopènan lan nganyari ad-hoc cilik lan ndandani bug

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
jw: Tetep app online lan pangopènan penting

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
jw: Data sampeyan bakal kasedhiya ing https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
jw:
Jinis data sing diunggah saiki ora didhukung; mangga
                      mriksa tooltips lan tab 'About' kanggo rincian.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
jw:
Yen sampeyan ngunggah file teks/csv, priksa manawa file
           kolom iku numerik lan dijenengi 'wavenumber' lan
           'intensitas'.
